=== Software Freedom Day: September 15, 2007 ===

{{http://myweb.cableone.net/dthomas/images/sfdy.png}}

Well the day came and we had a good turn out handed out about 30 disk and enjoyed talking to all the people that showed up here are a few pictures of what the event looked like.

{{http://www.dthomasdigital.com/ubuntu/sfd1.jpg}} Adam gives an OLPC presentation

We have a location and time now

Rio Rancho, New Mexico Main Library <nowiki>[[http://www.ci.rio-rancho.nm.us/documents/Cultural%20Enrichment/Library/Star%20Hts%20map.pdf|Map to the library]]</nowiki>

Time Sept 15th from 11:00am till 3:00pm

We are working very hard to make sure we incorporate One Laptop Per Child even my cat wanted one.

{{http://myweb.cableone.net/dthomas/images/dvdcase.jpg}}

 Each packet (dvd case) contains
* One Open CD disk
* One Ubuntu 7.04 disk
* Instructions on how to install the OpenCD and Ubuntu disk (printed on both sides)
* Tri-fold Open Source brochure 
* Ubuntu and Software Freedom Day Stickers
* Ubuntu New Mexico LoCo Information card

Keep track of our progress on SFD at http://www.softwarefreedomday.org/teams/northamerica/NM/Albuquerque/NewMexicoUbuntuLoco
